t: Q: What size dogs can pass through the sureflap pet door?
s: I would guess that a small dog, such as a Norfolk terrier, would pass through the pet door with no difficulty. Karen M. &#183 August 21, 2014 ... A very small dog or cat would fit. My Cocker Spaniel (medium size, 25 and 30 lbs) were too big. I had to return the SureFlap Microchip Door.

t: Q: does the pet have to push the door to open it or ...
s: My cats have learned over time ... of the door to unlock (a click sound) before pushing it. ... One person found this helpful. Do you? ... YES, the pet must push the flap to enter.
